website_summaries.verdict: Designed to protect your back, the Oscaurt Anti-theft backpack is ideal for carrying books and small electronic gear in comfort.
pros: A hidden main compartment zipper deters would-be thieves, while the compact, lightweight, and stylish travel backpack is the perfect tout for daily commutes or extended travel
There is plenty of room for a 15.2 inch laptop, camera, windbreaker, sunglasses, and other personal gear
cons: While it is a sturdy, durable, and compact case, it will not accommodate a 17-inch computer, drone, or other bulky electronic gear

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need in a backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so complete, it has so many small pockets for wallets and cables and things. They are also separated by soft thick layers of material so you things won't hit at each other. And it also comes with a USB charging too is amazing..!!! The zipper is like on the back so people can't open it without you noticing, anti-theft like it says. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: yi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I recently bought it after using north face for nine years. It has a modern design and looks very sturdy. I am a working pressional and the backpack fits my work laptop well. It's very also very handy when I need to travel. I just put it on top of my luggage bag. The anti-theft feature is a plus. I look forward to using it every day in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Z.

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, you’ve found it.
customer_reviews.text: I only post reviews if I’m compelled. Mostly that happens in a negative capacity, so I’m honestly pleased to leave a positive one for a change. This is a great backpack at a great price. There’s a lot of storage, it’s well made, good materials... and most of all, it’s been thought through. This pack just functions. It’s a great all-rounder and I couldn’t be happier with it. Do yourself a favor, don’t spend big bucks on big brands, because this is far more of a pack than you’ll get in most places.
customer_reviews.author: thisisnacho

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: The black part can easily scuff, but wipes off easily too. Took this travelling to Europe in areas where pickpocketing was pretty prevalent. The bag seems pretty discouraging since it's harder to zip open the main compartment. There is a outer zipper, but if u set it up right, it will be difficult to open also. The inner zippers are hidden and blocked by the bag straps. The bag storage is pretty good. Laptop storage and a smaller bag/pouch combo for phone, wallet etc. Overall not a bad bag. Like the look and the extra sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: amazoner35

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has a slim profile even when you pack it up. Hold everything you need. It fits well on my back. I have a rump and it doesn't bump or bounce on it when I walk.😁 This bag is a bit cumbersome for daily use but probably great for travel. The zippers hide well. I find that I have to completely open the bag to retrieve an item. Been using it daily for about 3 weeks and no tears in the material. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: QT Grl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Anti-Theft Travel Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! We took it on a trip to Paris and had no problems! We were concerned about pickpockets and just general convenience, and this bag was everything we needed. We liked that the zippers could be hidden along the inside, which made it so that only we could open it. We also appreciated the fabric quality and internal compartments, which allowed us convenience and organization in the rain. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Insured Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son saw this and wanted it for school. Looks great and love that the zippers are hidden. USB charging port is a nice tough. Material feels sturdy and quality seems good. Will see how it holds up during the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Luong

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical. Never Purchased Bag Only Before. Would Purchase Again In A Heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a bag without losing it in my hands before. I was very nervous about ordering this and skeptical that the quality would be decent. I was beyond pleased to be proven wrong. The bag arrived in a sealed plastic bag and was packed into a box. The quality is great. There were and still are no issues with the bag or zippers. It is durable. I like that I can easily distinguish my bag from the sea of other bags that look the same. I would purchase again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for a trip to Europe last week and after a week of use I have to say I really love this backpack. It is really stylish to look at, and held everything I needed along with keeping things safe. I looked at a bunch of similar ones but settled on this one as it had the side water bottle holders. I didn't try out the usb cable yet, so I can't comment on that. Looking forward to using it on future trips.
customer_reviews.author: gdesignr

customer_reviews.title: Good travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel! Used it around Europe and it was great. It isn’t very big but big enough for the necessities!
customer_reviews.author: Paulap

customer_reviews.title: Storage is not the biggest but I still fit 8 notebooks  and 8 folders with a binder
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it had a charging port on the outside for quick easy access while I’m in school and what not, I see many kids with their book bags just hanging open because someone thought it would be funny to unzip it. Jokes on them now haha
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually liquid proof
customer_reviews.text: This bag is more of a professional type backpack not bulk carrying system. It’s perfect for late high school use 11-12 th graders and up with all the slotted portions the bag contains. It’s super friendly to use very functional it’s actually liquid proof...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really modern nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Everything is really good. The compartments makes it really handful to organize things. the quality is more than good. The space for every compartment is on point. It very well made. I used this for college. The only problem is if you want to make room for more than the compartments. I cannot put things bigger or bulky stuff cause all the backpack will get very tight. I think this is ver normal but gets tighter than expected. This is not for traveling with a lot of things but for casual use is very helpful and the design is a conversation starter
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Perfect for tech heads it's slim and small but with enough space to carry what you need, has low profile huddled side pockets and a strap to put the bag on the handle of carry on luggage. I love the battery compartment it's big enough to fit my anker 20,000 mAh quick charge battery and there is room for a bigger battery. The extra hidden zipped side compartment on the outside I have a 10,000 mAh battery with cable for, I carry my work uniform and Bluetooth headset. The feeling of the fabric feels durable, it's comfortable to use as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel.C

customer_reviews.title: WORST BAG FOR WET WEATHER
customer_reviews.text: Even though the bag started cracking on the outer material, this was still my everyday work bag. Big wake up call last week when it rained. I had no umbrella and walked 8 blocks to the train station, didn't think anything about the weather because of the material on the bag, boy was I wrong, all of my loose paperwork in my bag got wet. So now i'm awaiting a new purchase of a bag the states "WATERPROOF"...
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Handy Travel pack for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This anti theft backpack was more than handy for our trip to Japan. It definitely has the capacity to carry all your essential goods. (Drinks, antibiotics, first aid, and even helped with an umbrella) it also had enough space for our souvenirs. Over all, it's a really great pack for travel. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DarkRenegade1

customer_reviews.title: It does what its suppose to do.
customer_reviews.text: I like this book bag a lot. I like the look it has while wearing & it holds pretty much everything I need to carry. Its strong, sturdy, deep pockets, strong zippers, good padding, and craftsmanship. Oh yea I also charge all my Apple products on the Go!
customer_reviews.author: MJI

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag while in Barcelona. Love the hidden pockets! Great if you’re trying to avoid pick pocketers. Not the best waterproof option. It rained one day and the water seeped through the grey portion of the bag and got some of my stuff wet. Nevertheless great anti theft bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. harris

customer_reviews.title: NOT ENOUGH ROOM FOR A HIGH SCHOOL STUDENT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my junior year of high school and was extremely disjointed to find out within the first week of school that the backpack can fit AT MOST a portfolio folder, a school lunch, a notebook, and a coffee cup in the outside packet. The zipper is so hard to use when the backpack is close to being full that i have spent 3 minutes trying to close my backpack after every class, almost making me late to my next class. Maybe this backpack would be good for an elementary school student or a hiker, but if you are a middle school, high school, or college student I DO NOT suggest this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is very uncomfortable. The back padding on it is rock solid and it hangs really oddly on your back. It’s recently been raining and my things still got wet. It’s really crowded inside the backpack. You really have to store everything into one of the openings and it’s annoying trying to look through it in class.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel montiel

customer_reviews.title: NOT anti theft proof
customer_reviews.text: I leave for Europe tomorrow and I just got my backpack and I was super excited to put my things in but when I tried it on I noticed that you could see all the zippers which defeats the whole purpose of the backpack!! Plus it was really uncomfortable on my back
customer_reviews.author: Celess Valle

customer_reviews.title: falling apart after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I am bummed cuz i loved this backpack. i have only had it for 5 week and the stitching on the velcro for the laptop pocket is coming undone I don't think i have un done the velcro more than 100 times. its on a padded panel so idk how to fix it maybe super glue. it makes me worry about the rest of the stiching. sadly i loved the rest of it but 5 weeks is not a long time. i had my last backpack for 18 years got it fro free test driving a scion. I just expect a bag to last better.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Insane amount of storage space
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, smart looking bag with insane amount of storage space. I carry 3 laptops and a tablet with their chargers, couple of notebooks and I'd still have space for clothes in there. Cons: the charging port is pretty unreliable as the cable is not fixed to the port.
customer_reviews.author: Arshi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who are super anxious about their shit being stolen
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my first flight overseas and it was spectacular!! It carries a lot and didn’t feel like it weighted a thing. I actually went to the club overseas with this bag and the security guards took a minute just trying to open it ahhaha.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Oscaurt anti theft travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Delivered product not the same as what i had initially selected. Usb port extension for power bank does not stay in place, always digging around to place it in its socket - time consuming and irritating. Fantastic good quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the pockets and space!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the pockets and space! This pack is great for traveling - keeps me organized!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I realized and prone to scratches
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't realized how small this backpack was until I purchased it. It just barely fits my laptop and 2 notebooks. This is about as much as would like to put in the bag, but this is almost stuffing it full, so in the off chances I need to stuff a sweatshirt in, it's not possible. Also owning this product after only 4 months, and under fairly light use cases the black material on the front is full of scratches! but they look like stains and I am embarrassed carrying this around campus. Also, the zipper is about to break, the quality of materials is very lacking. So only after 4 months, I'm looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Stivala

customer_reviews.title: ... it would be and while the theft-proof idea is good it really makes things awkward when trying to get ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is much smaller than I thought it would be and while the theft-proof idea is good it really makes things awkward when trying to get things in and out of the backpack without the entire thing opening up and spilling everywhere. The charger portion is nothing more than a cord and really not valuable at all since you still need to purchase the charging pack and the cord to plug into your phone so what's the point? Get a bigger, nicer backpack for the same price and buy a charging pack. Done.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna H.

customer_reviews.title: Tech Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my tech bag for work. This holds a good amount of items. Plus the battery pack space comes in the clutch. Defined will recommend to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low durability: Seams rip and it has not held up well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack in July 2017. It's September 2019, and the time has come to toss it. Seams started ripping right away - first to go was the blue liner which tore the first week I owned it. The inner strap stitching also came out within the first month. Those were minor problems, as the features of the backpack and design always met my needs. I liked all of the compartments, which made organizing things for business travel easy. Unfortunately, the straps have ripped to the point where they are about to fall off - only a couple of threads are holding them on, so into the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: poor quality but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: 1, rips after 3 days' of use, poor quality, have to throw it away. 2. the bag is smaller than the picture The customer service reached out to me and provided me with a full refund. They claimed that they used a wrong material and it's been fixed since.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BACKPACK FOR TRAVELING
customer_reviews.text: I recently brought this backpack on an international trip. It has an excellent capacity and can be used very easily as a carry on. I also felt that my belongings were very secure while I was walking around in the crowded city areas. My only complaint was the zippers were very difficult to zip on my backpack. I wanted to continue using the backpack for work after I finished traveling but the zipper did not seem to hold up. I would've liked to be able to use the backpack for more than one trip but it did work well during my previous trip.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very small with very less compartments, very tidy space
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for small backpack for day trip this is fine, especially with waterproof material, but if you are like me and was looking for a backpack for office this for sure you don't want to buy. I had headphone, laptop, charger, cables, extensions, sticky notes, wire less mouse and this bag was full, there is no space, especially because of only 6-9 compartments, inside + outside. The bag came with scratches on the top and let me say that I was not satisfied by the solution they provided, so I RETURNED it back. 1 start for material and 1 for design. my 2 cents, not useful as office or college laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Pockets everywhere! Feels really durable! The charging cord is included(no power bank of course), I just took some electric tape to secure it to the dock. Only issue and I'm just griping but the top part where the zipper should be concealed doesn't do a great job when on your back. UPDATE: After using this for a while for a daily backpack I realise it has incredibly limited room. Fabric scratches way to easy. Dropped stars
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lecompte

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Travel Backpack
customer_reviews.text: AN AMAZING backpack for travel. The zipper is almost totally hidden so no need to worry about anyone getting in. The bag weathered all storms - literally. We were in Paris, Belgium and London and all three cities are very wet. We never had any issues and the water just ran off. The storage inside was good, wish there was a bit more room, but for the size and look of the backpack, it was plenty big. Tons of little pockets to keep travel gadgets organized and safe!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff & Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Entire inseam ripped on FIRST DAY of use ... very poor quality, and short return window.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this purchase. We bought it on June 20th, didn't use it until Sept 6th and the entire inseam ripped on the first day of use for an 8th grader with no books in it yet - only composition notebooks & folders. While it is our fault for not fully testing between purchasing and 30 day return window, the quality is so incredibly low I would *NEVER* recommend this bag for anyone carrying anything in it.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Limited space for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this book bag but it’s not efficient at all. It’s cute, however doesn’t really hold much. You can only put a laptop, phone, keys, wallet and a water bottle, and maybe a pair of shoes. All these things listed makes the zipper almost not want to zip completely. My purse can hold almost all these items, however, carrying a purse on one shoulder isn’t the best either. The front pocket is not very usable and difficult to get into so it just looks nice. The straps are way too long as well. I will be returning. Other than the space issue it’s a cute bag but not functional for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money this product is extremely cheap the zipper broke after one day I am so disappointed in amazon for backing this product I usually never have issues returning an item but I’ve been struggling with getting a refund
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great features - great for commuter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby as he has tons of air travel - he needed something with pockets to store his valuables (ie passport, phone). I picked this for the hidden zippers as I know pick-pockets can be very sly - a harder zipper makes a harder target. Turns out my hubby's favorite feature is the storage cable he can access easily - no more pulling out wires in the airport/plane to re-charge. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DCAggie

customer_reviews.title: Which is which???
customer_reviews.text: I just received my backpack in the mail today. The zipper is ABOVE the backpack straps. Even the photos for this item show two different designs for this backpack. One photo shows the zipper UNDERNEATH the backpack straps. This was my understanding of the most secure location to prevent theft. If the zipper is ABOVE the backpack straps, it is not as secure. Why there a photos representing two different designs is beyond me. I prefer the design with the zipper UNDERNEATH the straps. I haven’t decided if I will return this item or not.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli Bee

customer_reviews.title: big, stiff and bulky.
customer_reviews.text: It's very bulky and heavy. I was very excited about this bag and was very disappointed when it arrived. It was very bulky and stiff. Not easy to pack i wasn't able to fit a lot in the bag. It was very uncomfortable to wear. I'm not sure if its because I'm not very tall and the bag is big, stiff and bulky. I was so annoyed with the bag by the third day of our 11 day trip I just left it in the hotel room and bought a new bag.
customer_reviews.author: DDshoptilidrop

customer_reviews.title: Low quality materials on bottom crack and fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: I had this backpack for about 6 months before the bottom panel started to crack and disintegrate. After that started the backpack became useless as I couldn't even put it on the floor of the subway or bus if it was wet at all or else the stuff inside my backpack would get wet. And the tiny pocket near the top (without the zipper) was too small to really be useful and stuff would fall out of it all the time. And the USB cable they provide does not stay in the correct position to easily charge devices. Recently decided to ditch this one as it was becoming too much trouble to work with.
customer_reviews.author: HelloTokyo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but be gentle with it
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad backpack buy one day on the subway in NYC it got heavily scuffed. The external materials aren't rugged at all. I think the bright blue interior is awesome and makes it easy to see inside. And it holds a lot of stuff for it's size. There is a pair of snaps inside that forme a hinge so the bag doesn't flop entirely open. And the external USB battery port is useful too. Although I had it 4 stars...I'd say it's 4 and a half.
customer_reviews.author: B-Side

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Commuter Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for the daily commute to work carrying a laptop and a few other essentials. Really like the sleek design so it’s a little nicer looking than the typical backpack. Due to the sleek design the inside is a little limited so not the best for travel. I had a MacBook, noise canceling headphones, a small note book and a light weight hoodie on a trip and it felt pretty stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS Is A Great Product 👌👍👌
customer_reviews.text: I Was in. Japan - for Almost a month.. and I had bought This Back Pack, (From Amazon.. Before I Left..) for the Obvious REASONS... Anti Theft.. Light Weight, Water Proof.. and VERY - Easy to take even w/ a Suitcase.. (Pull Up The Long. Handle.. Criss Crossed The Backpack-- Back Straps- Over The Handle - w/ the Front of the Backpack - Facing. Out) * AFTER-- Looking at MANY Other Backpacks.. I Finally Decided on THIS One!!! So.. HAPPY I Did - and, I Packed It - in the Suitcase - Going Over.. and. Then Used it .. ALOT OVERALL.. OVER - There!!! Definitely 👍 😊👍 😊 👍 😊 GREAT 😊 Product 👌😊👌
customer_reviews.author: Marianna  Hyder

customer_reviews.title: Ripped while traveling first time
customer_reviews.text: Strings snapped at the seams when standing in line for the tsa to touch me inappropriately. This backpack is a lot smaller on the inside. If you think it might fit, it probably wont. I was able to fit a small; light blanket, half a change of clothes, and a hygiene bag in this begore it was too much. I actually regret this purchase and would have rather had a regular backpack for people to steal from
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Colley

customer_reviews.title: The perfect backpack
customer_reviews.text: Favorite purchase of the year! I'd been seeing advertisements for these anti-theft backpacks, and I was so eager to purchase for the storage alone. Plenty of pockets (especially hidden pockets), durable material (and waterproof as described), and the icing on the cake is the ability to charge your phone in a discrete manner. 100% recommend this to anyone on the fence of whether to buy this backpack or not.
customer_reviews.author: SPalmer90

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than I expected and I was a little disappointed in the amount of wear that it had
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was a bit smaller than I expected and I was a little disappointed in the amount of wear that it had. For a single semester of college, there's already a large tear in the inner lining (from me trying to cram all my things in it). The grey color gets dirty very easily and the black waterproof part already has several scratches from going throughout the day. For someone who simply wants a backpack for a light use with the features that it was advertised for, buy it. Otherwise, the compartment space is a bit small and it doesn't hold up to wear and tear all too well.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Roo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Shoulder Strap Upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: When I received the backpack, one of the shoulder straps was altered in form as it appeared damaged when I received it. Not only does this cause cosmetic damage but the functionality of the product has been affected as the shoulder strap feels off when it is resting on my right shoulder. I am disappointed in this product as it did not meet my expectations in terms of day to day comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Nas

customer_reviews.title: Does the job as described.
customer_reviews.text: As the product is described it protects every major item from the main bag storage area with the zipper being towards the wearer. This one has a pocket on the front that "could" be accessed which other makers do not include in their design. It comes with the USB extension for the power bank of your choice (not included). Water bottle storage on both sides for up to a medium sized bottle or cup. Overall it has plenty of space for my rugged latitude 12 table with keyboard attached and many folders/peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The built quality is good, the design is cool, but the backpack is very uncomfortable. I used to have a simple Thing backpack without issues but since I've switched to Oscaurt's (almost 2 months ago) my back hurts a lot. The thing to hold the backpack is localed in an unpleasant position. I wish I could return this, but I'm no longer in US :( I'll probably buy another backpack.
customer_reviews.author: gil.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and build quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy 2 other bags until I found this one and am I glad I found it. All other bags I found had little to no protection for a laptop. My 15 inch laptop fits securely and I'd be confident it could fall 5 feet in this bag from any angle and be fine. Just enough compartments to store your essentials and room to spare for books and others. Has a lot of fun little compartments to store item's and it looks good. Only gripe is it doesn't have a chest strap because I will use this on my motorcycles but it has perfect straps to add some. Has good weight and build quality. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Bluuskyz

customer_reviews.title: Charging system stopped working. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The charging system which is accessible through the side of the backpack stopped working 12 days after 30 days return window. Not a good product, don't but it!
customer_reviews.author: Nova Vida

customer_reviews.title: Travel, NO.  Lighter office use, sure.
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. Put to the test on a 24 day across Europe adventure... and that was it’s last. I will admit I probably over packed it... but ultimately I would not suggest this for travel as the capacity is lacking plus unforgiving and inner lining ripped in a huge way after 2 weeks of constant use. For campus/office or lighter use sure. Nothing more extreme. Water resistant pretty good! Maybe laptop bag only?
customer_reviews.author: Zen Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Good for 30 days....that's it
customer_reviews.text: So let's see. Last day I can return is June 1. And today June 5 the lining rips. Figures.
customer_reviews.author: theflying44

customer_reviews.title: not the best design
customer_reviews.text: it works but overall the bag is pretty small. One down side is that it still has a zipper on the very back... Why would they bother doing that? its supposed to be an anti theft back pack and most of it is. except for the zipper on the very back.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Security.
customer_reviews.text: In terms of security, this backpack is great!! It's not the best bag for a carry on, solely because it is hard to access your passports and other travel documents. You have to take it off and unzip the main zipper to really get anything out of it. But in the end, that's why I chose it! The security of the backpack is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size and comfortable for long wear
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase. Fits a lot without being too big or bulky, has good padding to keep belongings safe, many pockets and compartments to organize a lot of items. Very comfortable to wear. The zippers can be tucked in for added security and it is difficult to get into them quickly/easily however, they do not have a latch to further secure them like some other brands. Very sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My zipper failed!!!! I'm on the plane on the way to Australia it's going to be a long 10 days....
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: nice backpack for student
customer_reviews.text: This is an electronic media backpack and not particularly designed to hold very many books/binders as it is only 4.5-5 inches at the base, but if you have a student in a school that has a program designed around electronic media (e.g. chromebooks, etc.), then this works great to store that along with a book or two. My child loves it and receives lots of compliments on it. The build quality and materials are nice and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I used it to travel to India and it worked well. I completely filled it for flights, but carried just my necessities during the trip in India. Love the hidden pocket, I kept money and my passport there while traveling. Backpack is not heavy, but is heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The material is not too great. I have been using it constantly, but the bottom of the backpack started pealing little by little. The storage place is very limited. The backpack is very bulky, but not a lot of space. My computer fits fine, and my ipad, but thats pretty much it. It doesn't many slots to put things away. I ended up using my old backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've seen many of these types of backpacks for much more. This one does the job. It features a clean design at a reasonable price. I wish the zipper pull for the main compartment was different from the small side pouch. Since they feel the same, I often pull on the wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: jsuave6

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Feels secure.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an italy trip. Got rained on. The outside was drenched and took awhile to dry however my camera,wallet,charger etc. Was inside nice and dry. I like the small details. I thought the bright inside color would annoy but it actually saved me time looking for darker things at the bottom of the bag. Also the zipper being on your back and extremely difficult for someone to try to get in there without you noticing made me worry less about my passport and money and more about enjoying where I was.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lopez

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing connecting the outlet/USB
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely water resistant and easy to clean. There's a plastic attachment of where it looks like the USB is supposed to plug into, but there's nothing there once the plug is in. As in, the plastic part is more or less a decoration. The straps are uncomfortable if they are touching your bare skin. I can actually pack more in my regular old school Jansport backpack. The biggest reason as to why I bought this was for the charging capabilities. I wish I would have looked closer at it while still within the return window.
customer_reviews.author: lvbayarea

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It
customer_reviews.text: 11Year old Grandson researched and chose this pack for his birthday.He does not use it as a bookbag only when taking his computer on trips. Has held up to his use for 10 months with no signs of wear. His normal packs have lasted 6-9 months before needing replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Sleek enough to aid in pocket theft prevention
customer_reviews.text: Purchased too assist with pick pocket prevention/deterrent. Traveled to 7 countries in one trip, with quick movement. Tucked zippers really helped with that. I was still even able to add a lock to the top zipper so it was very reassuring. Traveled with laptop and many other things. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Love it
customer_reviews.text: The good: it’s very difficult for someone to grab anything from Thai backpack, absolutely anti-theft. The materials are just as described, doesn’t feel cheap, and the organizational pockets in it help keep everything really neat. The bad: because it’s anti theft, it’s difficult to open it, so if you’re running around in school and need to open the backpack for a calculator or a quick notebook grab, it’s not going to be quick, not too bothered about it, I still love it overall The ugly: my dog ate a yogurt on top of it, it was too late when I caught him
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Sleek, and Compact with WATER POCKETS
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so sleek and wonderful. It's incredibly roomy on the inside despite it looking so small. It's not bulky or heavy. HAS POCKETS FOR WATER!!! Absolutely an amazing buy. I've had it for over three months now and not one issue. Over the moon with this backpack, especially for THAT cost. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vasiliy

customer_reviews.title: Looks Ugly buy does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: While this bag might not look that good on you, but the functionality does the job. You pretty much feel 100% safe of anyone taking your stuff and the additional features like charging cable and multiple pouches to store stuff is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Hrithik

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable
customer_reviews.text: Great Purchase. Expected to fit other important stuff besides laptop but kinda narrowed main space ,hard to fit other things when the laptop was placed. Other than that,has other great features that are helpful .
customer_reviews.author: xocotl

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Way roomier than I anticipated, good material, has the port to charge devices, looks good, and a lot of good compartments you can use to protect items. Definitely looking forward to traveling with this in the future! ONLY a thing keeping it from 5 stars is that the “pads” or whatever are not the most comfortable but they should at lead protect the materials in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: JTenorH

customer_reviews.title: Consealed zippers get exposed after a short time of use.
customer_reviews.text: So originally i thought, oh so cool. It looked nice. It seemed Anti-theft. However after using it for about a week I noticed that the material changed shape and all the concealed zippers are now exposed. This multiplied by the fact that the backpack is rather small totally ruined it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Gromova

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Water resistant is a bit of a stretch. The backpack is also not as big as i was anticipating it to be. On a positive note, with a large external battery (i purchased a 34000 mah) it makes an amazing travel backpack. it is also extremely comfortable to wear even fully loaded with books and other school supplies. The materials are adequate at best. Overall a decent product and a nice travel backpack for he price.
customer_reviews.author: augs

customer_reviews.title: very clean look,
customer_reviews.text: I had not used a backup since I left school, could not find the right fit..this one I loved.. everything is organized nicely inside. perfect pocket for my glasses..my bottle of water. the hidden pocket is a little tight.. I put a couple of invitations I needed to drop off perfect place not to get wrinkled. I love the inside color.. vibrant aqua.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: It is not water resistant. It may proof the theft, but you may drop things.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was described as water resistant, however, my stuff in the bag was soaking wet after rain. The design may proof someone else opens your bag, but the zipper will open itself. And if the bag opens, all your stuff will fall out. I passed the return window and I did use it for almost 3 weeks during a trip, so I did not return. I do not recommend anyone else to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good though. I'd give it 1 start but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to open and close, extremely limited space, uncomfortable to wear, usb port did not work from the start (tried multiple chargers but the port is just cheap and doe snot transmit anything to your phone), wish I could return this. Looks really good though. I'd give it 1 start but it does look very good and was made very well with the stitching, but you are honestly better off with Jansport or $10 knock off brand than this thing. I'd say this one is a poser to the higher quality packs that came out by the real guys. This one does not measure up.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite impressed with this bag. I'm not sure I've even found all the hidden pockets and zippers in this thing. It's smaller than the images suggest and is very light. The build quality is excellent. I have yet to find even a small defect. I would have liked to have seen a cross buckle over the chest. It hangs a bit low on my back and that might have corrected it. I'm happy with what it is.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kister

customer_reviews.title: Very good school backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Holds up real well in the rain when walking from class to class. This is really meant for school use, even then, if you carry a lot of text books all the time you might want to get something a bit bigger but this one can carry my macbook, a notebook, and 2-3 textbooks depending on the size perfectly fine with extra room for the little things. Very sturdy and is packed tight enough to make it as easy as possible on your back. The side pockets also make enough room to conceal a couple of water bottles or even a small umbrella which is very nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is EVERYTHING!!! Charger, roomy, great look, great quality! Birthday present for my daughter, and LOVES it! She travels on the subway everyday, and this carries files, laptop, coffee mug, water bottle, and is is all charged up in case she needs to charge her phone! Great Gift !
customer_reviews.author: A. Romano

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: good backpack but there is a problem with the sticking i guess where when you put it on the ziper stays exposed to people behind you makking it easy to see. once you put it on you have to check in a mirror to make sure zipper is not exposed. other than that its a good backpack.
customer_reviews.author: yesiel delapaz

customer_reviews.title: Already ripped
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail last night, but I didn't open it until today. The first thing I found was a HUGE rip on the seam to a pocket for the charging port. I am going to fabric glue it and pray but this is ridiculous. I JUST bought this bag. I am highly dissapointed. i love the bag, but the quality sucks. Maybe I got a bad bag, but deffinatlly a hirrible first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel bag
customer_reviews.text: This bad worked awesome for a trip. I now use it as a work laptop bag. The fabric design is very nice. Only issue I had was it doesn't repel water that great. 1st night on vacation in downpour and the inside was dang for at least 24 hours. I had no concerns with it getting opened workout me noticing with the somewhat hidden zipper
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: Daughter chose this backpack for college primarily because it has the charge port. Be aware you must supply your own battery. Pretty sure she lost the battery we bought her within a matter of days, but none the less she likes the backpack and it has held up to a lot of abuse during her first semester of college. We're now in semester 2 and it seems to be holding up fine. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: hfa8592

customer_reviews.title: Not really anti-theft.
customer_reviews.text: This is a copycat of a backpack that keeps the zipper hidden as you wear it. It seems to work as you load it but when you wear it the weight of your items actually exposes the zipper. Not as advertised at all! Plus you can't keep much in it, and I like to keep snacks, and have room for layers when you travel from one climate to the next.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for school he loves it. Its not real large but it can hold the items needed for school. There are a few hidden pockets, and there are also pouches and a zipper pocket. The pack it well made and does not feel cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Zippers seem weak
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack. It took a minute to figure out the usb port. however the zippers seem weak. I can see the main zipper will fail sooner than later, but still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag works as anti-theft
customer_reviews.text: Bag works as anti-theft bag but not much more than that. It is as advertised, water resistant, stylish, looks great on both women and men but after a trip to the airport I found the zipper really uncomfortable to open and close as my bag was full. The bag really works as advertised but only if its not on its full capacity, maybe a couple of books and an ipad or laptop, a little more than that and it will get uncomfortable to wear. I won't use it for travel anymore, maybe just for college
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit for work and I LOVE this backpack. It is sturdy and the zippers are simple to use but are well hidden for when walking in crowds. It has great inner pockets with lots of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: ThatMom

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great anti-theft backpack! I wish there was more storage in the backpack as it doesn’t fit much besides a laptop. However, it is a good backpack, especially if you live in a rainy city.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 backpacks on Amazon to try out. 4 of them were cheap Chinese garbage. 2 of which were the exact same with different branding. This bag is made with quality materials and suits my needs perfectly (freelance graphic design). Great organization options and thoughtful pocket placement. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jsoko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack and does what it's intended for except it doesn't fit a lot of stuff inside and is uncomfortable to wear on long trips. I had a water bottle, camera and tripod in my bag and found it didn't support my back to well
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy item and hard on the back
customer_reviews.text: While this product is overall ok, one must consider the weight. It is quite heavy. I wish the manufacturers used a lighter material so it becomes easy on the shoulder and back.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Does not open 180 degrees as stated in their video.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this backpack today and I was really excited about my purchased. At first look everything looks awesome. However, when I actually tried packing it up that’s when I noticed a deal breaker for me. So in the video it states that the bag opens a full 180 degrees and it doesn’t. My backpacks zipper doesn’t go all the way to bottom how it does on the video so packing it becomes a huge hassle as you try to balance the damn bag. I order two and this is enough for me to return them. As per the last picture you can see that some of the features that they advertised did not come with the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: lorena mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Not a big bag but definitely room for stuff to carry around like an laptop or iPad and cables...took it with me to Tokyo...worked out great...and enjoyed having the charging pack slot to charge my iPhone on the run.
customer_reviews.author: Agent M

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I take this backpack with my most anywhere I go. Lots of pockets on the inside, and it feels extremely sturdy, I've had mine for about 3 months and it still looks new, even with quite a bit of weight in it continuously. Only complaint is that the USB cable that runs from your power bank to the port outside the backpack doesn't like to stay put. But a little glue fixes this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for our trip to Germany. It fit two coats, the table guide, and a camera. The side picked had our water bottles and sunglasses and we carried our passports in the pocket that sits on your back. We didn’t use the charger cable much but the pockets for the pens and other things worked well for us!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knock-off, buy something better
customer_reviews.text: Pretty obviously a knock-off. The features are good in theory but poorly executed. It doesn't really hold that much, and it's interior pockets are fairly useless. The charging port doesn't really work, it's just kind of there - I could only ever get my phone to "slow charge" from it, even while plugged into a fast charging battery.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small with too many compartments
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but it's smaller. It has so many compartments and padding, that it takes away from how much it will hold. Took it on vacation, but never used it. Wasn't large enough to be practical.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, great looking, and just plain cool!
customer_reviews.text: This book sack is beautiful! I got the black exterior and it looks so nice strapped to my back when walking to class (although that hasn’t happened much this year: it’s 2020). It has surprisingly more storage room than I expected. It’s also excellent as an anti-theft backpack; it’s hard to open it when it’s off my back so I know it’s gotta be near impossible to do that while it’s on my back. Excellent build quality as well, 9/10 times would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Werth Jr

product_meta.title: Oscaurt Laptop Backpack, Anti-theft Travel Backpack, Business School Bookbag with USB Charging Port for Men & Women Fit 15.6 Inches Laptop Grey
feature_bullets: Anti-Theft Backpack: Made of strong anti-scratch /-cut fabric, this college backpack keeps your belongings pretty safe with hidden zippers of the main pocket and a secret pocket at the back

Convenient Charging: Via the built-in charging cable on the inside of the laptop backpack and the USB charging port on the outside, you can just plug in and charge your device anywhere (Reminder: Power bank NOT included)

Great for Your Electronics: The business backpack has versatile compartments for separately storing pens, phone, wallet, notebook, and up to 15.6 inches laptop – protected from shock with elastic band and velvet inside

Less Stress, More Comfort: The adjustable shoulder straps, widened and well curved with padding, and EVA material at the back section of the laptop bagpack for back protection and breathability, can offer painless carrying for a few hours

Meticulous & Minimalist Design: This school backpack is equipped with reflective strips on front for safe travelling at night, and a luggage strap that allows the travel backpack to hook to the suitcase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,218 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
